metadata.title: CVE-2024-42081 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/xe/xe_devcoredump: Check NULL before assignmentsAssign 'xe_devcoredump_snapshot *' and 'xe_device *' only if'coredump' is not NULL.v2- Fix commit messages.v3- Define variables before code.(Ashutosh/Jose)v4- Drop return check for coredump_to_xe. (Jose/Rodrigo)v5- Modify misleading commit message. (Matt)

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
